Instruction: Heat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Prepare a 1-quart casserole dish with a light coating of grease.

Layer slices of zucchini and tomatoes alternately in the greased casserole dish, then sprinkle with chopped green onions. Whisk together vinegar, oil, mustard, salt, and pepper in a separate bowl, and pour over the vegetables.
